Module project482.c482_project
Package Controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
Controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the ModifyProduct.fxml view. Manages the functionality of modifying an existing product, including searching for parts, modifying product details, and managing associated parts.
